tech.title: CORE TECHNOLOGY
tech.description: Providing world-class technology solutions through continuous R&D and innovation.

item1.title: Nano-scale Precision Control
item1.desc: Implementing ultra-precision coating and control technology in nanometer units for next-generation display and semiconductor processes.

item2.title: Advanced Control System
item2.desc: Perfectly guaranteeing stability and reproducibility in production environments with proprietary software algorithms.

item3.title: Custom Engineering
item3.desc: Designing and manufacturing equipment optimized for customer-specific requirements and process parameters.

item4.title: High-Speed Precision Process
item4.desc: An optimized system that demonstrates maximum productivity without compromising quality and yield.

display.title: Next-gen Display Solutions
display.desc: Leading the market with ultra-thin coating and high-precision lamination technology for OLED, Micro-LED, and flexible displays.

semicon.title: Advanced Semiconductor Packaging
semicon.desc: Providing state-of-the-art equipment for wafer processes, advanced packaging, and cleaning processes to ensure the highest yield in chip manufacturing.

battery.title: EV Battery Manufacturing
battery.desc: Providing innovative electrode coating and stacking solutions designed for mass production of high-performance lithium-ion batteries.

support.title: CUSTOMER SUPPORT
support.question: Have any questions?
support.desc: Please feel free to contact us anytime, and we will respond kindly.
